jobDescription: Requisition Number 17-2923 Title Dental Assistant- Ortho City San Jose State CA Zip Code 95122 Description  The qualified applicant will assist the dentist at the chair while they are engaged in treatment with patients,  anticipate dentist's needs and be prepared for next steps, and ensure all OSHA, Dental Board, and company  policies and procedures are properly followed. Come join a fun, friendly, professional company where we care greatly about our staff. Advance your career with us!
